comments.author: DaCryptoRaccoon
comments.body: Privacy toolkit for transaction distribution you don't mix with anyone else but you can distribute coins and mask them via 1000's of transactions or even blend coins on your own.

comments.author: CryptoHFs
comments.body: Quote from: MagicByt3 on July 08, 2023, 01:09:01 PMPrivacy toolkit for transaction distribution you don't mix with anyone else but you can distribute coins and mask them via 1000's of transactions or even blend coins on your own.Thank you but does that involve more gas fees or with the same cost of normal transactions?I will donate once I have extra

comments.author: DaCryptoRaccoon
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoHFs on July 08, 2023, 02:18:07 PMQuote from: MagicByt3 on July 08, 2023, 01:09:01 PMPrivacy toolkit for transaction distribution you don't mix with anyone else but you can distribute coins and mask them via 1000's of transactions or even blend coins on your own.Thank you but does that involve more gas fees or with the same cost of normal transactions?I will donate once I have extraIt uses dynamic gas price retrieval so you will be all good.

comments.author: DaCryptoRaccoon
comments.body: I recall a time where this forum was active people were interested in privacy based projects.Seems every other topic including scams get's attention but actual projects looking to create useful tools get ingnored.I think Bitcointalk has run it's course and become the dumping ground for scams.So sad, How times have changed.

comments.author: CYBER_COWBOY
comments.body: Quote from: MagicByt3 on July 12, 2023, 11:27:06 AMI recall a time where this forum was active people were interested in privacy based projects.Seems every other topic including scams get's attention but actual projects looking to create useful tools get ingnored.I think Bitcointalk has run it's course and become the dumping ground for scams.So sad, How times have changed.May I ask how is that?Just because people not are interested in supporting you?

comments.author: DaCryptoRaccoon
comments.body: Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on July 17, 2023, 03:06:31 PMQuote from: MagicByt3 on July 12, 2023, 11:27:06 AMI recall a time where this forum was active people were interested in privacy based projects.Seems every other topic including scams get's attention but actual projects looking to create useful tools get ingnored.I think Bitcointalk has run it's course and become the dumping ground for scams.So sad, How times have changed.May I ask how is that?Just because people not are interested in supporting you?No just the fact the scam projects are being bumped by farmed accounts while legit projects get pushed to the bottom of the pile. Sooner Theymos works out who is farming all these comments on topic the better.But it's been going on for years now I now know why a lot of people left here and are not around anymore.

comments.author: CYBER_COWBOY
comments.body: Quote from: MagicByt3 on July 18, 2023, 09:24:47 AMQuote from: CYBER_COWBOY on July 17, 2023, 03:06:31 PMQuote from: MagicByt3 on July 12, 2023, 11:27:06 AMI recall a time where this forum was active people were interested in privacy based projects.Seems every other topic including scams get's attention but actual projects looking to create useful tools get ingnored.I think Bitcointalk has run it's course and become the dumping ground for scams.So sad, How times have changed.May I ask how is that?Just because people not are interested in supporting you?No just the fact the scam projects are being bumped by farmed accounts while legit projects get pushed to the bottom of the pile. Sooner Theymos works out who is farming all these comments on topic the better.But it's been going on for years now I now know why a lot of people left here and are not around anymore.I haven't been here so long so I don't know, but you have totally right in that scam threads get a lot of attention, drama and unnecessary stuff.I have check your post a little bit, and actually like a lot of it. I am little bit suprised nobody has said anything yeat if i gonna be honst.but i need to read the rest of your post tomorrow or next day and check everything and will donate some small amount, i am not a bitcoin millionaire just been in this crypto world for some years, but I love it. Take care / CC
